title: Steve Jobs trailer
text:
Steve Jobs trailer 
Thursday 2 Jul 2015 1:54 p.m. 
Set backstage at three iconic product launches and ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac, Steve Jobs tells a behind-the-scenes story of the digital revolution to paint an intimate portrait of the brilliant man at its epicenter. 
Steve Jobs is directed by Danny Boyle and written Aaron Sorkin, adapted from Walter Isaacson's biography of the Apple founder. 
Michael Fassbender plays Steve Jobs, the pioneering founder of Apple, with Kate Winslet starring as Joanna Hoffman, former marketing chief of Macintosh. 
Steve Wozniak, who co-founded Apple, is played by Seth Rogen, and Jeff Daniels stars as former Apple CEO John Sculley. 
The film also stars Katherine Waterston as Chrisann Brennan, Jobs' ex-girlfriend, and Michael Stuhlbarg as Andy Hertzfeld, one of the original members of the Apple Macintosh development team. 
Steve Jobs is set for an October release. 
Watch the trailer .
